name: Karting4Fun
description: Have some fun with friends on one computer or online! Enter a race full of adrenaline and fast turns. Hitting and pushing are allowed! There are tracks in the open air or the halls.

name: Shooter Buddies
description: A fast paced, Sci-Fi first person shooter. Up to 4 buddies defend the planetary core against an onslaught of robots!

name: Saturday Morning Rogue
description: The top-down 2D rogue-like where you fight through infinite levels with your own custom built weapons. Beat your hi-score with the ultimate weapon, or a dud that should never have left the toy aisle.

name: Stand of Arms
description: This is a hard-core first-person shooter game with armed conflict as the background. Players can operate more than a dozen weapons, fight on the front line where the situation is changing rapidly, and experience a unique strategy game of guns and bullets.

name: The Insignia Project
description: The Insignia Project is a horror game that delves into an alternate universe within our multiverse where it has been corrupted and broken beyond repair. UO#-405 is now an ever-consuming universe where all of your nightmares come together into one place. Our universe has just been added to the mix.

name: Anime Squad
description: Anime Squad is an Online First-Person Shooter game set between two rival teams, Pink Force and Purple Ghost. In Anime Squad, you can choose the Pink Forc and Purple Ghost sides, see and experience how devastating this sweet battle can be.

name: Chernobyl Inferno
description: Go in search of your brother, who got lost in the catacombs of Chernobyl, among aggressive inhabitants mutilated by radiation.

name: Mythrealm
description: Explore a fallen land of mystery and lore. Battle against dark and ancient monsters. Traverse deadly pitfalls, and advance your character in this fantasy 3rd person action RPG. Uncover the chaos that is darkening the land and fight for the magic that empowers the Mythrealm.

name: VR Long March
description: The Long March is a great miracle in human history. The Central Red Army fought more than 380 battles. During this period, it passed 14 provinces, crossed 18 mountains, crossed 24 rivers, and traveled about 25,000 miles.

name: Poet Squad
description: Poet Squad is a real-time tactical party-based kung-fu action. A Mortal X-Combat for short. It features a unique setting of Persian Cyberpunk, taking place in the post-war matriarchy state of the United Sultanates.

name: Cyber Rebellion
description: Cyber Rebellion, A Cyberpunk style VR campaign game

name: One Rainy Night
description: One Rainy Night is a puzzle platform game in which you investigate the mysterious disappearance of the inhabitants of Sleepy Falls.

name: The Sabotage
description: The Sabotage is a multiplayer coop in which players try to find gold together, while one of them, as a saboteur, tries to prevent this from happening.

name: Hanefield Asylum
description: Horror themed Asylum game, with FPS and a story line, Fight your way through the Asylum using a light and a gun to discover your identity and find your way out!

name: Not Another Princess Game
description: A princess locked in a tower. Some heroes who come to rescue her. Will they succeed? You've seen this approach hundreds of times, but remember, this is Not Another Princess Game.

name: Grappling Ball
description: Grappling Ball is a single player platformer where you control a ball with a grapple gun and use it to go up against 10 levels which increase in difficulty

name: Restart Zero
description: Restart Zero is an action shooter in cyberpunk style. Experience a fast-paced adventure single or local coop multiplayer.

name: Storm & Calm
description: Who are you? Just a wolf prowling through the gorgeous autumn woods? Or maybe something else? Could you find all answers while touching story about complicated relationships between mother and daughter reveals before you...

name: Nauticalypse
description: Explore the mysterius sea and defeat mythologic creatures to get gold and treasures. Build different weapons to defend and improve your ship.

name: Hack Jump
description: Hack Jump is a 2D Platformer with nice Story.

name: Lame Defenders
description: Fight waves of monsters in real-time tactical battles using a team of up to 5 heroes. Collect new heroes and create as many teams as you like as every team is better for different situation.

name: Matias Candia: Lord Doomer
description: In this 2D shooter, you play as the streamer Matias Candia, find those evil hackers who stole your channel and kidnapped The Chat! Fighting against different types of enemies, rescuing your friends, and... Off-course, drinking Bepis!

name: Gustav Vasa: Adventure in the Dales
description: Follow the young nobleman Gustav Eriksson Vasa on his journey to take the Swedish crown. Escape the Danish soldiers on skis through a stunning wintery landscape. Travel from village to village and recruit the Dalesfolk to support you in taking the throne in Stockholm.

name: Beyond Horizon
description: Once on a distant exoplanet light-years from home, you have to operate an advanced probe to look for vital signs for colonization. What secrets will you uncover in humanity's most ambitious project to date?

name: Cannabis Farmer Strain Master
description: Cannabis Farmer Strain Master is a Unique and Timeless experience to test your skills to be come the ultimate Strain Master.

name: Whiskers & Tail
description: Two cute mice are taking the laboratory by storm. Test your reflexes, memory and problem-solving skills by taking on a wide variety of puzzle-based tasks.

name: Empower
description: Enter a physics based PC VR multiplayer Sci Fi arena sandbox that supports ranged and close combat. Switch dynamically between PC and VR mode and compete against other players and complex AI with fully physics-based weapons in a partially Zero G arena with different modes.

name: Atlas Falling
description: Atlas Falling is an action RPG with roguelike elements in which the game world is forged as you battle to discover the truth. Experience endless gameplay from randomized skills, levels, and multiple upgrade paths.

name: Dark Magic
description: Demons already know about your presence, arm yourself with magic and embark on a dangerous journey!

name: Elwick
description: The worlds of elemental magic and tile-matching puzzle collide in Elwick! Clear your grid and craft spells in a fight for your life or solve dastardly puzzles. Explore the intrigues of the Mage Academy in a single-player campaign, meeting and unlocking playable characters with unique powers.

name: Bike Messenger
description: Be the fastest messenger on streets, hop across all the traffic. Observe an amazing sunrise while chilling out on your bike. Find the best route to deliver various packages, take part in killing-fast street races, customize your bike, and fly on your bike through the symphony of vibrant city sounds!

name: Exotic Cars VI
description: The protagonist of Exotic Cars VI, has in the game what is called the hero’s journey, it is a path of revenge and redemption. The protagonist has a mentor to help him, along his journey he has to lose everything he has and all his loved ones in order to complete his journey and rise again.

name: Enchantress
description: Enchantress - A Psychological Thriller Game. Play as Megan Sterling in her journey to discover the secrecy hidden within the walls of WhiteRose Orphanage. Lose yourself with different discoveries and beware you don't meet a similar fate.

name: Way Far Home
description: Join the Hardcore adventure with little Fox. Travel through lands and sky, discover the secret of the Jungle. Overcome the suffering of exhaustion, painfulness, lost in fear. Find true love.

name: BrightSeeker
description: Journey through the world where magic and technology are intertwined, defeat dangerous enemies, discover hidden secrets and vanquish challenging bosses.

name: Tower of Mice
description: Tower of Mice is a Action RPG with randomized content. Choose your battles or be forced to hide from enemies. Level up and acquire new both skills and perks hidden in the forest. Explore a demonic realm that consists of puzzles and fierce encounters. Reach The Tower and uncover the truth.

name: Medieval Apocalypse
description: The main goal in Medieval apocalypse is not only to survive as in previous survival games where you had to watch over the hunger, thirst, fatigue but the player will have to watch out for infection caused by zombies to not become one of them.

name: XenoShyft: Psychogenics Lab
description: They say the mind is the deadliest weapon of all – Now more than ever thanks to the research of NorTec's Psychogenics Lab. Sign up today to unlock the hidden potential of the human brain! This XenoShyft expansion enables the new Psychogenics Lab division and 5 new Psychogenics cards for your troops.

name: Tom's Adventure
description: Help Tom hack-and-slash his way though a dream from which he cannot wake up. A hand-drawn action-adventure through a dreamy world filled with fleshy monsters, insane situations and strangers that needs help.

name: Eternal Destiny: Angel's Ladder - Next Manhattan Project
description: Third DLC for Eternal Destiny, with a new story and dungeons for the newly released 12 Angels cards.

name: Eternal Destiny: Demon's Casket - The Seven Sins
description: We got an emergency call from a museum in Vatican! Fly there and find out what is happening with your navigator. The fate of Earth is in your hands!

name: Eternal Destiny: The Attribute Sanctuaries
description: The new Attribute Sanctuaries are a series of 48 dungeons (16 attributes/3 difficulty levels) in which Attribute Slots and Super Slots appear in battle slots. In addition to the existing Cybers, Kells, and Demons, now you can make more use of various attributes like Water and Flame in battle!

name: Eternal Destiny: Demon Slayer - Turmoil of Tohno
description: First DLC for Eternal Destiny, with a new story arc and dungeons for the newly released Japanese Youkai cards.

name: Eternal Destiny: Dragon's Dawn - Revenge of Tiamat
description: Third DLC for Eternal Destiny, with a new story and dungeons for the newly released 12 Angels cards.

name: Beyond the Waterfalls
description: Beyond the Waterfalls pits players against each other in a world trapped between waterfalls which players go from one environment to the next leading to one fire fight to the next in fast paced combat. Pick your favorite class and outwit your opponents.

name: Super Brain Cube
description: Super Brain Cube! Your color cube puzzle clicker in space with great soundtrack.

name: StrateZ
description: StrateZ is a casual post-apocalyptic RTS game where you fight to survive as one of three separate factions be it Survivor, Zombie or Marauder.

name: Island of the Lost
description: A relaxing first-person exploration game. Journey through eight unique environments as you collect treasures, unlock secrets and search for a way off the island.

name: Silverwing
description: Silverwing is an action flight game where you build an array of powerful spaceships to combat enemies across space and a diverse array of planet landscapes. Play through a fully voiced 20+ mission campaign with multiple endings based on your mission choices.

name: Zombie Rush: Heroes
description: Build villages and train units to defeat zombies

name: Unlimited World 1
description: Unlimited World 1 is a open world survival game with a story mode and a mulitplayer mode. You can build, fly, craft and many more

name: Puzzle Soccer
description: it's not enough to be the fastest nor the most skillful player, sometimes you must to be the smartest one! Use your memory power and strategic ability to move your players in the correct order to score the goal.

name: Kana! Kana?
description: Sin descripción

name: VR Modern Wars: Advance Under Air Raid
description: Under the bombardment of fighters in the Middle East battlefield, players need to cross the lines of defense of the enemy camp and reach the beam of light safely.

name: Grid Attack
description: Rhythm game controlled with arrow keys

name: Genfanad
description: An Indie MMORPG inspired by classic MMOs and smashing tropes together.

name: The Sims 4: Everyday Stuff Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sims 4: Stuff Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sims 4: Outdoor Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sims 4: Starter Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sims 4: Sims' Night Out Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sims 4: Bundle Pack 6
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sims 4: Bundle Pack 4
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sims 4: Bundle Pack 3
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sims 4: Bundle Pack 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Luminesce
description: In luminesce you fly through a neon world blasting everything you see, there are many different enemy types in this awesome Shmup!

name: Crayons
description: Sin descripción

name: Frigid
description: Hunt, build, craft and survive an apocalyptic arctic environment and unravel the mystery of a strange virus that is infecting the local wildlife. Inspired by The Thing!

name: The Backyardigans
description:
Make learning extra-fun and engaging for your little one with the LeapFrog Leapster Software. This product works with the LeapPad Leapster. Designed for pre-K-first grade or learners ages 4 to 7 years old, it presents plenty of fun activities that will develop skills involving letters and phonics, numbers and counting and motor function and memory. This learning game software features characters from the hit Nickelodeon TV series, The Backyardigans.

- Suited for Pre-K to 1st Grade
- For ages 4 to 7 years old
- Works with the Leapster
- Teaches numbers and counting, letters and phonics, memory and motor skills
- Explore the Frozen North to find a Yeti, help a pirate find its treasure, use pattern-matching to help a cowboy cross a canyon and find hidden items on the beach, among others
- This Backyardigans software is part of the LeapFrog learning library

Release date: February 1, 2007

name: Super Mario Sunshine 64
description: Super Mario Sunshine 64 is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario 64 developed by Kaze Emanuar. This mod adapts part of Super Mario Sunshine stages and story for Super Mario 64. The mod was supposed to adapt the whole game, but was cancelled before completion.

name: BlackThorne Keep: Chronicles
description: Thommas BlackThorne is the last heir of the BlackThorne, a once noble family of the northernmost edges of the empire. When his family lands are given to a new noble, Thommas needs to travel south to find his older brother that decided to dedicate his life to the church - and deliver the news of the Fate of the BlackThorne.

name: Legacy
description: A single player fantasy RPG starting in a prehistoric era. Survival and city building along with group raiding mechanics puts you in control of the leader of your people trying to survive and then thrive. Start with just a few villagers and expand into a sprawling advanced civilization. Survival, exploration, crafting, city building and role playing mechanics all influence the gameplay. Game is in development with a developers early release available to play.

name: Curly Monkey 2
description:
The sequel to the first title; the gameplay premise is the same, but it is faster paced and has higher quality graphics. There are also portals that can take you to new areas.

Curly Monkey 2 is a chinese plug-and-play game, Most known by My Arcade. Exclusive to the Gamer V Portable and Go Gamer. and possibly to many more My Arcade products.

name: Curly Monkey
description: You play as a monkey that has to jump from platform to platform, while simultaneously collecting items and shooting at enemies with a boomerang. This is an unlicensed game that is a clone of NES hardware.

name: Speculum Mortis: Regret
description: Speculum Mortis (Latin for "mirror of death") is a horror-themed first-person point-and-click adventure done mostly in greyscale. Speculum Mortis: Regret is a remaster that fixed several bugs (including at least one game-ending bug) and added some content to the original game.

name: Dip the Frog
description: Follow the story of a joyful little frog who goes on an adventure in this super-tight platformer.

name: Bukkaku
description: The indie game is of experimental genre with mostly horror elements. Bit of survival with sci-fi and RPG elements. A story between life and death in a stylized game origami world. Bukkaku created by Lukas Reznicek aka RZE.

name: PewDuckPie: On the Run
description: A PewDiePie's fan game

name: Gyaruzuma Sex: Hoka no Otoko ni Inwai Houshi Suru Ai Suru Tsuma
description:
The protagonist, Naohiro, and his wife Risa have been married for 4 years. Their married life is smooth sailing, and the good relationship between them is enough to be envied.

Except for one feeling born from Naohiro's heart...

It all started with a small incident. One night, when the couple was happily drinking together, Risa talked about her ex-boyfriend, and after the conversation, Naohiro felt a strange excitement.

Feeling weird, he searched the internet about it, and while doing so, realized that he does indeed have "that" fetish.

However, he can't possibly tell that to his beloved wife, but the more they find happiness with each other, the more stinging sensation torments him from within.

Then one day, one of his juniors back in school, Tsukasa, consulted him about something...

name: Ai Suru Tsuma, Mariko no Furin Houkoku: Otto Kounin no Gachi Furin Sex
description:
The protagonist Sashihara Yasushi and the heroine Sashihara Mariko have been married for 5 years.

Mariko was found out to have had an affair back when they were newly weds, but nothing major came out of it and they've lead a peaceful married life since then. However, they are worried that their life in the bedroom become boring as of late.

Then one day, Yasushi received a post-cheating sex report from his wife Mariko.
- Her partner is a new employee who is 8 years younger and a virgin.
- He was a long-distance running athlete during his years in school.
- He confessed to her after having sex in a love hotel.

Mariko said that she wants to become his lover and have it officially recognized by her husband.

An absurd demand, but things were different for Yasushi who has a desire to be a cuckold.
He felt intense excitement that he hadn't felt for ages.
Yasushi accepted Mariko's request and her husband-affirmed adulteration began...

name: Astoria Legends: Red Moon
description:
Each year on the eve of the Red Moon, the Astrals call forth their Envoys and summons to the world the Tower of God. The arrival of the Tower of God also heralds the oncoming Judgement and brings fear and death upon those caught within its domain. Follow the Envoy of Fire, Astor Roen, as he descends upon Marcalaan and sets the city in chaos... for as long as he keeps his pacts to the gods alive, his home will be safe.

Astoria Legends: Red Moon is a 2D Character action game set to launch on the Nintendo Switch in 2022.

name: Heist Simulator
description: Lights, Camera, HEIST! Grab your perfect team then hack, unlock, solve and disguise your way to stealing England's finest tat and treasures. Once you're a master thief, take our tools into your own hands and create your perfect heist!

name: Random Racing
description: A collection of driving mini-games with unique exaggerated physics. Full cross-platform multiplayer enabled. Invite friends and compete in interesting game modes such as Sumo, Darts, Bomb-Tag and more.

name: Baseball 9
description:
Enjoy fast-paced, realistic baseball game, featuring compact gameplay and informative stats.

Play BASEBALL NINE to become the Legend League Champion!

name: Idle Industries
description: Sin descripción

name: The Wrestling Code
description: Sin descripción

name: Fire and Darkness
description: Fire and Darkness is a cancelled three-dimensional real-time strategy video game developed by Singularity Software. The game consists of a player controlling one of two factions, and their main mission is to defeat the enemy faction to secure the planet's resources. Although the project was incomplete, it became the first game to win the Seumas McNally Grand Prize at the Independent Games Festival of 1999.

name: DownFall BattleGrounds
description: Downfall BattleGrounds, the upcoming Free-To-Play online survival game from NeoLife Studio. Players will have the opportunity to collect weapons to survive, team up with friends or go solo and even build their own bases! Get ready for an intense, action-packed adventure unlike any other!

name: Detective S
description:
S became a detective to avenge her father R.
He was a detective killed by a serial killer 10 years ago.
In the end, the police couldn't uncover the case.
S felt the incompetence of the police and later became a detective herself.

name: Frostory
description: A story driven pixel art action adventure game.

name: Doortal
description: Doortal is a puzzle game that bends reality. What is on the other side of a door depends on what shape you put in. Can you collect all the shapes? Can you visit all the dimensions? How fast can you do it?

name: Final Fantasy Tactics 1.3
description: 1.3 is a mod made by Archael for the game Final Fantasy Tactics which greatly increases the game's difficulty by re-balancing the game. It alters enemies, items, jobs, skills, and fixes many gameplay mechanic exploits present in the original.

name: XCOM Legends
description: XCOM’s newest mobile game turn-based RPG, available in limited territories.

name: Coddle Pets: Dragon Garden
description:
Train Cute Dragons from babies to adults!

Level them up by playing mini games and exploring.

Carry those same dragons progression through a serious of different Coddle Pets titles.

name: BoF1LL: A Withering World
description: Together two companions will explore and restore their shrouded landscapes. Playable solo and in Couch Co-op!

name: The Evil Farming Game: Replanted
description: Richard, an ordinary farmer in an ordinary island village, murders his wife. He must hide her from the authorities, and keep up the facades.

name: Uchuu Daisakusen Choco Vader: Jinrui Yuukai Keikaku Abduction
description: Web game. Can no longer be played.

name: Infidhells
description: Infidhells is a Roguelite Puzzle-Game based on various stuff and of course Tetris. You'll encounter many foes, bosses, hectic items and game changing mechanics. Anyway, it should be great (when it actually works).

name: Les: The Horror Game
description: Sin descripción

name: PUBG Mobile: Season 20
description: Sin descripción

name: Shattered Minds: Encore
description: As a detective with a knack for strange cases, your Chief has assigned you to a new investigation. After a series of famous monuments vanish into thin air, you are sent to Paris to investigate a possible link between the disappearances and a calling card discovered at the scene. Play through challenging hidden object scenes and perplexing puzzles as you unravel this thrilling mystery. Can you solve the case before anything else disappears?

name: The Dark Hills of Cherai 2: The Regal Scepter
description:
Explore The Dark Hills of Cherai
A powerful artefact lies locked away, entombed behind a door that can only be opened by combining 12 amulets. Find the map and you will find the answers that you seek. Journey across the dark hills, discover curious hidden objects and overcome the guardian creature to save the Regal Scepter of Cherai!

name: Spirit of Arx
description: Spirit of Arx is a harrowing roguelike dungeon-crawler where players possess the spirits of the deceased in order to escape a labyrinthine fortress of anguish and misery.

name: River Master
description: Put on your captain's hat with River Master and prepare to take on important cargo deliveries across one of the longest rivers in Europe! Command several vessels including barges, container ships and ferries to make sure that you reach your destination as fast as possible!

name: Pole Position 2010
description: Pole Position 2010 will test your tactical mind and managerial skills to the limit as you head up your very own racing team. Whether you choose to take over an existing crew or establish a brand new team, you will be tasked with negotiating with drivers, suppliers and sponsors as well as participating in research and development of cutting-edge technology. Build your team from a pool of more than 200 drivers and 1000 crew members before constructing, testing and fine tuning your race car and heading to one of the 17 race tracks to put all your hard work to the test. As the manager you must decide the team's race strategy and communicate tactics throughout the race, watching them play out in real time. Races are won by a matter of seconds so one wrong decision could cost you a podium place. Once you have your team established why not challenge a friend via the multiplayer mode to decide not only who has the best team but who has the best tactical mind.

name: Curse of the Pharaoh: Tears of Sekhmet
description: Sin descripción

name: Create Your Own Model Railway
description: Build your own virtual model railway and watch it come to life in stunning 3D. No other software makes it as easy to create your own highly detailed tracks, stations, tunnels, towns, roads, level crossings and scenery. Ideal for railway enthusiasts of all ages, the only limit is your imagination!

name: Ports Simulator
description:
Ports are the lifeblood of a country's economy, a cornerstone of trade and commerce. Ports places you firmly on the dock as you take charge of the hustle and bustle of loading and unloading a vast variety of goods in transit.

Will you use a forklift truck, a crane or other loaders? The choice is yours, but with frozen goods sitting in the sun, or a ship's Captain eager to set sail time is of the essence. In the world of busy international ports, cargo earns cash allowing you to invest in ever more specialist vehicles and tools but spend wisely as time and tide waits for no-one!

6 true-to-the-original detailed machines and vehicles
20 different seaports and harbours
Different goods such as containers, bulk cargos and cars
Mission and career mode
Operate divergent vehicles & machines
Load and reload harbour goods fast and effectively
Learn about the work of a stevedore

name: Star Hunter DX & Space Moth: Lunar Edition
description:
Star Hunter DX takes you right back to the 80s with its fantastically stylized design!

Help the Bounty Hunter Luna Starr track down her former Space Pirate mates after they betrayed her and face off in interplanetary Bullet Hell fights!
Battle for high scores on the leaderboards and hone your skills in the extensive practice mode!

Space Moth: Lunar Edition is the updated Version of 1CC's vertical arcade shoot 'em up Space Moth DX.

The core elements are reworked for a brand new intense gamplay experience; the game is set across 5 stages that end in thrilling boss fights with multiple phases!
Define your playstyle and choose between the slow but powerful Moth or nimble and fast Hawk!

name: Hidiom
description: Hideom is a game whose focus is to look for English idioms that are hidden in a literal way inside the game. Each expression found rewards you with an achievement on Steam.

name: Yanyu
description: Free Open-World RPG Mobile Game of Wuxia

name: The Telos Monument
description: The Telos Monument is a highly atmospheric 2D psychological horror adventure game set in a strange and mind-bending monument, standing at the center of the dystopian world.

name: Country Adventure
description: Adventure and survival game that takes place in an open world RPG style, where you will start as a small farmer and you can even overcome dungeons full of enemies, decorate houses you buy or build, buy vehicles, fish, hunt, trade, raise animals and much more.

name: Gladii
description: The enemies of humanity lay siege from all directions. You must fight your way through hordes of demons, zombies, ogres, and more as you unlock new characters and battlefields! Play solo or team up with three additional players in this 1-4 player couch co-op arena battle game.

name: Riftnote
description: Write into perspective - with a simple and intuitive spatial notebook.

name: Furniture World
description: Furniture World is a unique chance to become a handyman. Buy, repair and improve furnitures. Give them a second life and sell them at a profit!

name: Block Breaker Ninja
description: Block Break Ninja is a well-known block breaking style game. You will be the Ninja to beat Shogun (military manager in old Japanese society) to get back his girlfriend. There are 25+ exciting stages, and you just have to grab your mouse for controller!

name: Heart of Siam
description: Classic 2D action retro platformer. Are you ready to collect all the diamonds and find the secret caves?Heart of Siam, after 14 years of development, now on Steam.

name: Bravers
description: Deep in the underground world of a planet devastated by Great Impact, Bravers invites you to become a captain of your custom ship. Captain who leads his crew through the fascinating journey full of danger, mysteries, friends and foes. Are you brave enough?

name: Cannibal Coast
description: Will you get revenge on your crew, head back to civilisation. Or will you succumb to the wicked ways of the Cannibal Coast?

name: Arcade Legend
description: Arcade Legend is an arcade simulator and management RPG. Clean up your run-down venue, add new games and customize the layout and look. Build your reputation to continue unlocking content and play officially licensed, modern arcade titles as you unravel the secrets the venue holds.

name: Raw April Day
description: A Victorian, Mystery Point-And-Click game set in Post-World War England, in which Jacqueline searches for her missing husband in his apartment and horrifyingly gets in and over her head.

name: SushiVR
description: SushiVR is a VR game in which the player becomes a general of a sushi restaurant and holds the sushi as the customer wants one after another and provides them quickly.

name: Thief's Shelter
description: Take up the role of Detective James as you try to uncover a mysterious criminal's hidden identity. Reveal deep and disturbing secrets, solve unique puzzles and bring the schemes of a dark Cult to light. All under the effect of Dementia, a syndrome capable of making you mistrust even your own self

name: Phogbound
description: The story about hungry creatures, who are living in the Fog.

name: Marble Ball Racing
description: Marble ball racing is a racing game. Player will control marble ball to race with other 24 AI marble ball in sci-fi stages theme.

name: The Happy Little Virus
description: As a virus, attack the servers of charities on orders from your sinister creator that seem strange... maybe even unethical? Journey down into their computers and engage in frantic debris-strewn battles with the antiviruses in this comedy puzzle shooter.

name: The Depths
description: You are a 45 year old man who wakes up in this new world trying to figure out its secrets as you explore this first person horror you will find your self sneaking pass threats hiding from the shadow beset and solving puzzles.

name: All-Inn
description: An unusual inn simulator fit on a single screen.

name: Planet Miner
description: Remove fog, look for and mine minerals, construct buildings, upgrade the rover and reach the portal.

name: Crisis Arcana
description: There you were, ecstatic that you had been chosen to serve as the grand wizard's newest apprentice. Next thing you knew he's legless and horrific monstrosities are now roaming the realms. It's your job now to go throughout these realms and defeating the horrors that lie in wait.

name: Astroroxx
description: Astroroxx is for everyone at every age. Surrounding 360° space attacks with virtual asteroids and you have to fight them. Shoot all asteroids within 90 seconds to reach the next level, and defend your high score. Featuring different space environments and a music tracks for the right sci-fi mood.

name: Just Shake It
description: Just shake it left and right If you make a mistake, rewind time.

name: Eager For Den
description: Metroidvania Survival Co-op Game in which you have to explore to survive, earn abilities to survive, play well-design characters to survive, cooperate with your firends to survive and survive to survive.

name: Speedy Gun Savage
description: Speedy Gun Savage is a first person shooter VR game where Wolf, the hero of the game is an intergalactical bounty hunter and travels to different planets to collect bounties. The game has three different planets with several enemies and three main boss.

name: The Host
description: After a Post-Armageddon event the world has gone back to its roots living in simpler times, back to swords, kings, and war. Something is brewing in the kingdom could it be related to the first apocalyptic event?

name: RushOut
description: Rushout is an enthralling and hilarious 3D ragdoll platformer with simple gameplay set in fantastic flying landscapes. And the prize for the best result will spark real excitement in you! Beware of crazy chickens!

name: Shieldwall Chronicles: Realm of Madness
description: Gather your party and venture into a corrupted land ruled by demons and dark magic. Explore freely in an open world and decide your fate in tactical, turn-based combat. Forge legendary heroes in the furnace of battle and make decisions that will have lasting ramifications for your campaign.

name: Namnokh
description: Namnokh is a Puzzle-Platformer where you take on the role of the nomadic Wanderer. After discovering an ancient sentient Box, you must use it's powers to bounce, change it's weight and pass through certain parts of the environment to traverse the ruins of Namnokh.

name: Chess on Ice
description: A casual sports simulation game built around using physics to throw and control throwing your rocks towards a target. Play with up to three other friends in local multiplayer, or by yourself in the 20+ stage challenge mode!

name: Intra Corpus
description: Explore the human body with the help of a miniature drone, fight off infections and viruses, and save the patient!

name: Ocak
description: Ocak is a turn based 2D/3D dungeon crawler. Explore stories, upgrade your weapons and fight against the Gʟɪᴛ𝒸ʜy dungeons beneath the Epoh.

name: The Curse of Fafnir
description: You play as a rogue mage who tapped into dark arts to try and gain more power but as soon as you opened a dusty old book, Fafnir was summoned and not pleased, which caused him to place a curse on you and sent you to a eternal dungeon. Survive by beating the dungeon and breaking the curse.

name: Fourzy
description: A competitive match four game.

name: Book of Sophia
description: Book of Sophia is an action adventure with roguelite elements. Follow the dungeon crawling journey of Sophia to discover the secrets of the book and the mysterious world.

name: Kingdom of Wreck Business
description: The depths of the Atlantic hide more than 12,000 sunken ships out of which at least half haven’t been located yet. As a depth explorer you will earn money from extracting valuable cargo from wrecks, grow your company, buy exploration vessels and real estate.

name: Starship Intruder
description: The interface IS the game. Using your keyboard in a command prompt-style, you will engage in combat with enemy spaceships, raid planets, collect warp cores, draw space cards to obtain advantages (and disadvantages) and much more.

name: Crypt of the Gods
description: Play through a procedurally generated dungeon as a wizard trying to obtain more power to free themselves as well as people like you. Overcome the dungeon gaining power, new abilities, and new magic as you transverse through the dark depths.

name: Dab's Not Dead
description: Buckle up for a hacking rhythm game about saving Cyberspace from a mysterious threat! Move to the beat, groove your way through security systems, and fight the Virus corrupting friendly Cyberfolk (also in local co-op!). Make your own levels using your own music or the official tunes!

name: The Seven Keys: Escape Room
description: Escape Room The Seven Keys is a graphic mystery adventure where your logical reasoning will help you escape, in addition to solving different challenges.

name: Jian Yu Ji Ban
description: SAS is a special rpg-like game. The game focuses on character collection, cultivation, team building, production, and dungeons.

name: Cave Explorers
description: Play as a member of the Cave Explorers. A team of specialist puzzle solvers who's role is to dodge traps and decipher clues in order to unlock hidden rooms and treasures for archaeologists to study.

name: Spellthief Erinn
description: Spellthief Erinn is a 2D Puzzle Platformer where you take control of the enemies magic attacks and use them to your advantage. Solve the misteries, explore the enviroment and reach the chest with a hidden spell. Find, steal and collect them all!

name: Bloody Cruise
description: Bloody Cruise is an adventure game where you play as a vampire travelling on an airship. Your task is to find the traitor and try not to succumb to your dark urges. In this suspense story you will explore the airship, talk to colorful characters on board and decide their future.

name: Space Junk
description: Intense action, retro-styled visuals, a sizzling synth soundtrack and tons of cool Sci-Fi references, all rendered in vibrant, neon graphics. Get your trigger-finger ready, turn the lights down, the sound up, and blast your way through level after level of fast paced, Junk smashing action!

name: Defend Till Sunshine
description: Defend Till Sunshine is a exploration-survival game which you will experience with your puppy. You need to survive againts multiple situations. Discover across the land, find villages, learn craft techniques, interact with villagers and learn tips from them, build your own house and more!

name: Color War
description: Color War is an extremely difficult bullet hell and boss rush style game where you attempt to bring color back to a shattered world.

name: Ona: A Mystical Art Experience
description: Travel across the world in an interactive and meditative journey to resolve the quest of our humanity.

name: Kate Kite
description: Kate Kite is a running game, beautiful painting style, beautiful music,You will love it.

name: Sheep Cutter
description: Cute clicker game with super simple controls which will make you forget about everyday stress. This game will take you on a farm where the only goal is to cut as much wool as you can, you will want to play this game all night long.

name: The Adventures on Uranus
description: The Adventures on Uranus is a short interactive experience. The game provides a chance to explore the imaginary planet of Uranus for a few minutes.

name: The Faded
description: An ongoing kidnapping mystery of little kids from past 10 years, can a 14 year old girl stop it?

name: Ambidextrous Psychopath
description: Ambidextrous Psychopath is a difficult 2D platformer designed to challenge players to use both sides of their brain simultaneously to control two separate player objects. With a full custom OST and a robust 81 level campaign, Ambidextrous Psychopath offers hours of challenging gameplay.

name: Buried Under Rocks
description: Would you choose the lie over the truth? Buried Under Rocks is an action and puzzling game with two different endings.

name: This Game is Trash
description: This Game is Trash. Yes, it's literal trash. You are a KEYBOARD and you ROLL on a UFO all the way to the END! WHAT MORE COULD YOU WANT?? But seriously, can you make it to the end? Because it took us like 1000 tries. We counted. So play the game and see if you can. Your life depends on it now.

name: Fore Score
description: Fore Score is a multiplayer miniature golf game with a twist! Build the hole as you play, alternating between placing hazards on the course, and putting, trying to score the lowest strokes while messing with your friends!

name: Slave Fighter X
description: SlaveFighterX is a 2D side scrolling lewd fantasy Beat´em up, where you fight old school arcade style against hordes of voluptuous enemies and unique bosses while ripping each other’s clothes apart!

name: 2051 AD. Your life
description: Sin descripción

name: Pistol Dancer
description: Twos hands two guns! Shoot'em up style rhythmic FPS. Press the trigger alongside music beats to unleash devastating power to the enemies Your enemies are little virus bits trying to reach the heart, and you are the last line of defence!

name: CanCan the Game
description: CanCan, the game of color and creation; a puzzle game using multicolored tiles.

name: Batallas Galacticas
description: a company is hiring people to drive a spaceship across the solar system, time to do some work and make some money!

name: Queerskins: ark
description: Queerskins: ARK is a 6DoF interactive virtual reality experience. Reading a diary left by the estranged son, a Catholic mother finds a way to transcend herself and her grief by imagining him alive and in love. Ark allows you to enter her imagination and co-create the lovers' intimate dance through your body position and movements.

name: Super Meat Boy: Race Mode
description: You know how you have that one annoying friend who would always be like "I'm so much better at Super Meat Boy than you" and "If we could race I would destroy you!" well guess what, get some potato chips, grab some controllers, and reluctantly call that friend over so you can shove his undeserving feelings of...

name: Age of Fear 4: The Storm Mountain Expansion
description: A mysterious creature is terrorizing your Sea People allies! Be warned, this monster may be more than meets the eye. Prepare to face all manner of threats on this quest to restore peace and prosperity to your new friends.

name: Age of Fear 4: The Victor's Experiment Expansion
description: A mysterious danger lurks within this abandoned laboratory, but it's locked away behind the lab's many puzzles. Are you brave enough to venture inside and uncover the truth of the unnatural entity that resides here?

name: Bigfoot Blood Trap
description: A woman inherits her grandfathers land. While hunting a Bigfoot attacks her and her family. After capturing the monster, they find a man who will pay any price to exact his revenge.

name: A Game of Thrones: The Board Game - Digital Edition: A Dance With Dragons
description: In A Dance with Dragons expansion, experience the era of the eponym book alongside an alternative 6-player setup and new sets of house cards for shorter and more intense game. Radically change your game with this expert scenario for A Game of Thrones, the Board Game Digital Edition.

name: LeftWay 2
description: Nampung encounters the nightmare again and this time also includes her relative people.

name: Starship Corporation: Cruise Ships
description: Expand your business and master space tourism. This DLC challenges you to design and build for a newly emerging recreational market. Fit as many passenger cabins and profitable entertainment facilities into 9 new fuselages. And don’t forget the lifeboats!

name: Camper Flipper
description: A country mechanic who's been scrapping various vehicles, trailers and parts at his place for years. Looking at the market trends, he decides to make millions by turning his trophies into cool campers, dream homes on wheels.

name: MX vs. ATV Supercross Encore: Copper Canyon Open World
description: Explore the huge Copper Canyon Open World through the Free ride mode and see if you can find any hidden surprises or be the first to the next gate with four brand new Waypoint races and one Nationals track!

name: MX vs. ATV: Supercross - Encore: Supercross Track Pack 1
description: Step up your game and test your skills on these four Supercross tracks located in Albany, Chicago, St. Louis, and Savannah.

name: MX vs. ATV: Supercross - Encore: Rhythm Racing Pack
description: Take on these 5 Rhythm Racing tracks and try to cross the finish line straight ahead!

name: MX vs. ATV: Supercross - Encore: Supercross Track Pack 4
description: Step up your game and test your skills on these five Supercross tracks located in Santa Fe, Boulder, Jacksonville, Manchester and Springfield

name: MX vs. ATV Supercross Encore: Supercross Track Pack 2
description: Step up your game and test your skills on these four Supercross tracks located in Charlotte, Cleveland, Kansas City, and Pontiac.

name: MX vs. ATV Supercross Encore: The Stewart Compound
description: Come ride James Stewart's private race compound! Includes five authentic JS7 tracks.

name: DCS World: A-10C - Basic Flight Training Campaign
description: The A-10C Basic Flight Training Qualification campaign puts you in the cockpit of an A-10C Warthog, and tests your ability to fly the aircraft successfully.

name: DCS World: A-10C - Tactical Training Qualification Campaign
description: The A-10C Tactical Training Qualification campaign puts you in the cockpit of an A-10C Warthog, and tests your ability to interact with JTACs, Airborne FACs, AC-130 Gunships and manage Close Air Support (CAS) assets.

name: DCS World: A-10C - Stone Shield Campaign
description: A-10C: Stone Shield is a story-driven campaign that puts you in the cockpit of an A-10C Warthog as a USAF pilot assigned to the 445th Air Expeditionary Wing. In 2015 Abkhazia, South Ossetia and Russia have announced the start of the "Caucasus-2015" military exercise.

name: DCS World: A-10C - The Enemy Within Campaign
description: The Enemy Within is a story - driven campaign that puts you in cockpit of an A-10C Warthog, sent as a part of small US detachment to Georgia in order to help contain a growing threat from a terrorist organization calling itself the "Caucasus Liberation Army" (CLA).

name: DCS World: A-10C - Advanced Aircraft Training Qualification Campaign
description: The A-10C Advanced Aircraft Training Qualification campaign puts you in the cockpit of an A-10C Warthog, and tests your ability to use the aircraft's weapon systems successfully.Based on real world qualification requirements you will fly 10 performance check rides to execute against pre-defined performance objectives.

name: DCS World: A-10C - Red Flag Campaign
description: The A-10C: 16-2 Red Flag Campaign is a depiction of flying the A-10C "Warthog" during a typical Red Flag exercise in the skies over Nevada. This campaign includes extensive briefing, map, and lineup card PDF files for each mission and was designed in consultation with the renowned author Steve Davies.

name: MX vs. ATV Supercross Encore: Squall Valley
description: You get it all with Squall Valley! Six tracks total races in our largest Open World ever! Two Supercross, two Nationals, two Waypoint races plus Free Ride!

name: Paraiso Island: Job Pass
description: Get the job pass to unlock new exclusive items and level up.

name: Paraiso Island: Mysterious Stranger
description: A mysterious stranger has appeared on the island, on a mission to find all the colors in the universe! This expansion adds the Mysterious Stranger to your game, along with a new series of quests.

name: Paraiso Island: Restaurant Expansion
description: Open a restaurant on Paraiso Island! Chop, mix and cook to prepare over twenty recipes, then serve them to guests! Don't let anything burn! This DLC unlocks the restaurant building and cooking mini-game.

name: Paraiso Island: Hotel Expansion
description: Open a hotel on Paraiso Island! Furnish and decorate your cabin to earn coins and help vacationing tourists to have a great time! This DLC includes a new customizable building and additional quests.

name: Tricolour Lovestory: Chapter Zero
description: Chapter Zero is the prequel of Tricolour Lovestory. The time was early summer in 2004, the time when we were all just young and innocent. Time drifted by like water drops, invisible but noticeable. You already know what would happen, this chapter would complete the whole story.

name: Harvest Green
description: 畑に種を蒔いて、後は水をやり育つのを待つだけ！！ 育てた作物は出荷してお金にしたり、種にして増やしたり、料理にして街のコンクールに出したり、食べたり、ご馳走したり！ 品種改良で新たな種をゲットして最強の農家を目指そう！！

name: Cartoon Magic world
description: This is a relaxed and magical cartoon world.Everything in the wizarding world is magic, and powerful enemies are your best chance to improve yourself.Maybe you don't know what magic is, but once you get into the game, you know how wonderful magic is.Welcome to the wizarding world.

name: Paraiso Island: Disaster Relief
description: Bring the playful Nacheline to your island! This expansion adds Nacheline, the raccoon to your island, with new quests. Help Nacheline provide some spirit to Paraiso Island as she builds a parade float! 100% of developer proceeds will be donated in support of disaster relief.

name: The 99
description: The 99 - An Action-Quiz Don't just answer the same stupid questions! At The 99 there are randomized quiz, memorie and puzzle elements in one little game.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Space Infantry Above and Beyond - Battle Pack 1
description: Lock 'n Load Tactical Series now heads in the world of Science Fiction adding the Space Infantry Above and Beyond as an expansion game. You will test your tactical acumen as the determined Space Infantry and Colonial Guard advisors of the Imperium.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Day of Heroes - Battlepack 1
description: Day of Heroes lets gamers rope down from a Black Hawk with a Chalk of Rangers or step off a Little Bird with Delta Force operators onto the mean streets of Mogadishu.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Zombies the Final Enemy - Battlepack 1
description: Lock 'n Load Tactical: Zombie The Final Enemy brings Lock 'n Load Tactical system into the world of Zombie horror and a different type of conflict.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of the Pacific - Battlepack 1
description: Heroes of the Pacific brings the award-winning Lock ’n Load Tactical game system to the Pacific theater with a vengeance. Heroes of the Pacific details America’s brawl with Japan during World War 2

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of Grenada
description: 'Heroes of Grenada' brings to life this conflict with US Marines, Rangers, and SEALs supported by AC-130Hs face off against the Grenadian military and Cuban troops

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Battles to the Rhine - Battlepack
description: Battles to the Rhine is an expansion module for Heroes of Normandy. Fight 6 new scenarios with 5 maps based on maps from Heroes of Normandy including 3 new Snow maps to reflect the cold and bitter fighting outside of Bastogne in December of 1944.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes Against the Red Star - Battlepack 1
description: Heroes Against the Red Star Battlepack 1 includes 10 scenarios from the first probes by Soviet infantry to the ultimate, desperate clash for the Important road and Bridges. This is modern street fighting., in the buildings, on the deck of the tanks.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of Nam - Battlepack 1
description: Heroes of the Nam Battle Pack 1 includes 12 scenarios, bringing to life powerfully armed Squads are at the vanguard of all actions, spurred on by daring Leaders.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of the Bitter Harvest - Battlepack 1
description: Heroes of the Bitter Harvest is a module for the Lock 'n Load Tactical series. It features a fluid, impulse-based turns, squad-level, and individual heroics, plus lots of armor and special rules to bring the fight for the southern steppes of Russia to life.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Pledge of Honor - Battlepack
description: Pledge of Honor Battlepack includes 9 scenarios, bringing to life powerfully armed Squads are at the vanguard of all actions, spurred on by daring Leaders.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: For the Emperor - Battlepack
description: For The Emperor brings the award-winning Lock ’n Load Tactical game system deeper into the Pacific theater with a vengeance. For The Emperor details America’s brawl with Japan during World War 2

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: We Stand Alone - Battlepack
description: We Stand Alone – Battles of Easy Company is an expansion module for Lock 'n Load Tactical: Heroes of Normandy. Formed in 1942, and after almost two years of rigorous training, Easy Company, dropped into Normandy, France, on D-Day,

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: The Untold Stories - Battlepack
description: Your missions range from needing to destroy bridges, important villages need to be controlled, daring rescues need to be made and vengeance must be doled out no matter the cost. Heroics, leadership, and as always, luck can mean the difference between victory and defeat.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of the Motherland - Battlepack 1
description: The Lock ’n Load Tactical Series advances into World War II’s Eastern Front with Heroes of the Motherland. The fate of the Soviet Rodina is at stake depicting ferocious battles across the Russian steppe, in the ruins of Stalingrad, and in Partisan-infested woods.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of the Falklands - Pack 1
description: Heroes of the Falklands Battle Pack 1 brings you to the windswept, rocky landscape of the Falkland Islands—or Islas Malvinas, as they are known by the Argentines. The brief but brutal war in 1982 began after the Argentines unexpectedly seized Stanley, the capital of the Falklands

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes in Defiance - Battlepack 1
description: Heroes in Defiance Battlepack 1 takes you to May 1940, and the Germans launched Fall Gelb (Case Yellow). Scores of German divisions flooded through the Ardennes and across the borders of France, Belgium, and Holland.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of Normandy - Battlepack 1
description: Heroes of Normandy Battlepack 1 has 12 scenarios. The scenarios cover battles spanning the D-Day drops, fighting the Norman hedgerows, and Operation Market Garden.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of North Africa - Battle Pack 1
description: Heroes of North Africa Battle Pack 1 contains 10 scenarios that feature everything that makes the award-winning Lock ’n Load Tactical Series stand out—fluid, impulse-based turns; squad-level and individual heroics—plus lots of armor and unique rules to bring desert combat to life.

name: Super Mario Bros. 3
description:
This prototype of a MS-DOS Port of Super Mario Bros. 3 was developed by Ideas from the Deep (IDF), which would later become known as id Software. It was presented to Nintendo, but was discarded.
The prototype has been found, and was donated to be preserved at the Museum of Play.

name: TKKG: Wer stoppt den Feuerteufel?
description:
Investigate with TKKG in a new, exciting case that you do not know from the radio plays or books!
Together with TKKG you search for traces, clues and suspects. Only if you repeatedly slip into the different roles of the detectives and cleverly combine them, you can solve the crime in an exciting finale.

name: Hot Dodge!
description: Steer the delicious 'Dog through the waves of horrible, healthy vegetables! Don't get turned into a healthy eater! Be 100% sausage rolls and pasties!

name: Fat Man Fights
description: Become a fat man in this super fun action-arcade game, centered around an innovative and entertaining pushing mechanic, where you compete in fast-paced, hilarious sumo wrestling games against quick-witted AI opponents for the chance to win more delicious food!

name: Burrow
description: A social sandbox game

name: Wanderfar
description: Immersive first-person roleplaying adventure with a focus on exploring a rich handcrafted fantasy open-world filled with interesting places to find, powerful items to collect, challenging enemies to defeat, ancient mysteries to solve and, ultimately, good friends to make along the way.

name: Savage Tower Defense
description: Savage Tower Defense is a unique tower defense game. It has lot of levels to be completed and, also, two endless levels. Include all of that with the fact that the higher the wave, the higher the amount of enemies.

name: Rapper Life Simulation
description: Are you ready to start your rap career? You can lead a real rapper life with studios, concerts, albums, gang wars. You must also be able to survive among hip hop gangs!

name: Survive Avalon
description: Survive Avalon is a sci-fi open world survival game combined with FPS and horror elements. The protagonist's spaceship crashes on an unknown planet. You need to explore the planet, hunt for food, and collect resources. The life is dangerous on Avalon. Every minute is another challenge. Far from your home, you can only count on yourself. Are you ready?

name: Burger Night
description: Burger Night is a comedy horror game, in which your only job is to collect items, explore, clean corpses and run from the god damn burger. And if you make it out alive, well you wont.

name: My UnReal Pet
description: My Unreal Pet is an experience game that temporarily protects abandoned dogs for 7 days. Challenge yourself if you can keep a dog!

name: Smash'em
description: There are far too many monsters in this world, so they must all be smashed. Use variety of weapons and power ups to kill them all!

name: Blobkin Blaster
description: Captain, we need your help, the Reef has been overrun! Take command of your Blobkin; the mightiest, tiniest, defenders of the reef! Fight for survival, clean up the ocean and destroy the defiled monsters of the deep. Build cannons, homes, and collect trinkets while restoring glory to the seas.

name: Dark Tides
description: A horrifying point-and-click adventure. Cape Fortune, a once-quaint, Victorian town, is in the grips of demonic possession. Their only hope? A fake boardwalk psychic who just found out she can actually read minds.

name: My Home Poltergeist
description: Curse humans with Poltergeist! Ghosts move objects in the mansion so that humans are not exposed to the curse ritual, and humans should carefully observe the objects to prevent the curse rituals from being achieved!

name: Cyberpunch
description: Cyberpunch is a post apocalyptic beat em up game for 1-4 players.

name: Now It's My Turn
description: In this classic turn RPG game. You will seek revenge for those that destroyed your homeland.

name: What Trash?
description: This is a garbage classification theme game, find the scattered garbage in different scenes, and throw them into the correct trash. Everyone is responsible for environmental protection!

name: Jumping Platform Minigame
description: Jumping Platform Minigame is a 2D platform game in which you have to collect diamonds and kill small mushrooms.

name: A Boy's Journey
description: Influence obstacles and gain power-ups in this beautiful skill-based platformer. Aim for the best highscore and if you don't like that one level, just generate a new one! Freeze and destroy obstacles or create a whole new path. Or give yourself a speed boost and invulnerability.

name: Mine Crazy: The Korean Grinder
description: This is the essence of Korean grinder MMO. In game, you'll mine rocks, earn money, and reinforce your pickaxe with that money.

name: Primordial
description: Explore a world filled with challenges and defeat foes to gain new abilities in this throwback side scrolling adventure.

name: Queen of Mountain
description: Queen of Mountain is a bicycle team race game where you train or hire some good bike riders. Each rider has her own name, outlook, and skill ability. Team them up and win the game.

name: Silent Night: A Christmas Delivery
description: Ride Santa's sleigh on Christmas eve and deliver all the presents. Explore islands generated procedurally, make smart moves and find the best route to maximize your score... Or just chill out in this silent night.

name: Brain Sanguo
description: Brain Sanguo is a strategy game with turn-based combat.You play as a seignior in a mythical world about Sanguo, develop your territory, employ warriors, build armies, and prepare for the uprising of Huangjin.

name: Your City in 3D
description: Get any city on the planet like it in the game and explore it.

name: The Cubedex of Boxes and Lines
description: The Cubedex of Boxes and Lines is a collection of seven puzzles pretending to be classic games in a cubic arcade. Like puzzle hunts or escape rooms, figuring out the goal of each puzzle is, itself, part of the puzzle.

name: Second Person: Secret Laboratory
description: Experiments. What could be better? - Horror from the second person. Controlling a monster created in a secret laboratory, reach your target before it hides from you or attacks.

name: Neon Shooter
description: Neon Shooter is a fast-paced dual stick style shooter that is full of neon colors, bright particle effects, and enemies to destroy. Be ready to jump in and destroy enemies, collect coins and power ups, and upgrade your traits to reach the highest score possible!

name: Lan Shi Zhan Dui
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiny Devil Adventure
description: This is a challenging platforming action as you explore the procedural lands to rescue your beloved. Gather and cook foodstuffs to increase your abilities with over 16 million recipes. Battle many enemies and bosses as you try to track down Brenda.

name: Reanimation Scheme
description: An otome game and romance visual novel about necromancy, love, life and death. Step into the shoes of the necromancer, Raenelle. Meet a colorful cast of characters, fail to summon the spirits of the dead, unravel mysteries, and maybe fall in love.

name: The Choice of Life: New Centurion
description: The Choice of Life: New Centurion is a detective card game based on a graphic novel. Dozens of game paths, hundreds of cards, thousands of solutions

name: Roman Empire Wars
description: Become an Emperor and guide your Legions to victory. Battle foreign armies and crush your enemies in a tactical real-time strategy game and show the whole Europe glory of the Roman Empire.

name: Charge Blade Hero
description: A fast paced 2D hack and slash, adventure game. Attack, Dodge, and Charge Up to maintain your weapon's durability as you take on waves of enemies.

name: Destroy the Dummies
description: Destroy the Dummies is a simple yet difficult, third person, action, arcade style, series of challenges, with an interesting dark plot twist mid-game. An homage to the games of the early days of 3D graphics.

name: Cloud Rack
description: A chivalrous man came to the mountain full of secret rumors to explore the truth, overcome all kinds of difficulties, meet all kinds of characters, and uncover the unknown secrets.

name: Smerch Battle Arena
description: Clash in furious combat in the yellow circle of the arena! Here, everyone will face bloody battles in PvP game modes and co-op to the last survivor. Fight for the leading positions and get valuable prizes for victory. Conquer glory in the arena as a Gladiator.

name: Arden's Wake
description: The sea levels have risen, and a young woman and her father live in a lighthouse perched atop the ocean’s surface. When he goes missing, she must descend deep into the post-apocalyptic waters previously forbidden to her, embarking on a thrilling journey of family history and self-discovery.

name: Tales of War
description: A medieval pvp game where you have to capture all the flags to win.

name: Count of Hatchet
description: Count of Hatchet is a turn-based strategy RPG where you take control of a county in a far corner of a crumbling empire. With dwindling resources and an advancing enemy army, you must make alliances or discover a way to stand alone.

name: VR Brewing Simulator
description: Learn the art of beer brewing on a commercial scale in this first-person, virtual reality simulator, moving around the brewery you will be turning valves, adjusting temperatures, grabbing, weighing and using the correct ingredients and vessels at the right times using your virtual hands. Let's brew!

name: Pop and Well
description: Pop and Well is a game where you can play with your friends and save the world.

name: Flow Space
description: Flow Space is a new type of VR rhythm game combining dance, art, and music, allowing you to trace featured Flow Tracks and record your own signature Flow.

name: JumpJumpBall
description: Spin, jump, and challenge various obstacles in an action game.

name: Helicopter Simulator
description: Helicopter Simulator: Exceptional missions in a detailed environment, creating an atmosphere for an immersive and bluffing experience!

name: Miner's Hell
description: Experience the dangers of being a miner when disaster strikes. Work with rescue crews to see the light of day again. Explore mine shafts dating from today back to 1870, the technology and dangers miners faced back in the day and those they face today.

name: Project: Skyscape
description: Project: Skyscape is a sandbox of vehicle simulations you can enjoy in Co-Op with your friends! Developed for the PC and VR experience in tandem, maintaining parity.

name: Pumping Simulator
description: Pumping Simulator As an active member of a gas station in a major city around the world, you can play with up to 4 friends in a multiplayer co-op mode or single player mode to help you understand what the pumpers are going through, and maybe will make you rich.

name: Outpost: Vikings
description: Finally in a new land you must find a way to survive. Hunt, gather, produce & build to grow your new settlement. Manage your allies & enemies & help your people prosper and conquer this new land.

name: Crazy Music Tennis
description: Crazy Music Tennis is a music rhythm sports game providing a high-definition dynamic and hot-blooded game experience for players who like music and tennis. In this VR game, players can use tennis racket to hit the fast-moving tennis along with the strong and even crazy music rhythm, and at the same time, they have to cross all kinds of pose shaped barrier walls.

name: The Viking Way
description: Experience the Viking way of life. Sail, explore, trade, build a fleet, and lead your fearless army to raid and conquest. Write your own story of the golden Viking age. You have many choices, and a leader can always find his own.

name: Ascended
description: Ascended, a game where you manipulate objects, time and light! Ascended is a sci-fi first/third person 3D puzzle platformer in which you must guide a light energy source through a series of sixteen exciting puzzle levels using the various abilities which you unlock along the way!

name: Drawgaem
description: Your friends don't get what you just drew and neither do you, welcome to drawgaem.

name: Kingdom of Bees
description: "Kingdom of Bees" is a game where you try to create a kingdom of bees. Kingdom of Bees is a real-time strategy game where you control a hive of wild bees that are trying to survive in a world full of dangers.

name: Pirate of Madagascar Island
description: Pirate of Madagascar Island is a third-person exploration game which may seem like adventure and open world game. In this game you are pirate in the Madagascar island and need to roam around and find the portal to jump to the next level.

name: Lucid Steam
description: The engineer has to make his way out of his dreams and defeat the boss. As time passed, bizarre and powerful monsters will appear and cause pain to the engineer. Can the engineer escape his lucid dreams?

name: Blobert
description: Blobert is a platforming gaming where you have to skillfully maneuver yourself around obstacles to escape the evil clutches of Troblob. Along the way you run into Fabby the Fairy who aids you on your quest for vengeance.

name: Warehouse Simulator
description: Manage your own warehouse and take care of receiving and sending orders. Become an expert handling the forklift and use it to do different tasks with it. Do missions transporting goods to different destinations with your truck.

name: Kitchen Island VR
description: Dive into an unique VR cooking experience! Adapt to the conditions of different islands and prepare recipes without letting anything burn! From cutting to smashing and cooking, proof your skills and become the best chef. Before facing the hungry end boss! Let the (VR) cooking begin...

name: Rules of Gravity
description: Take over the tasks of an astronaut either alone or with a space friend. Explore space and repair the space station, because you don't know what else is coming.

name: Hope Land
description: Hope Land is a third person Survival multiplayer RPG set in the world after the ending of the world. Can you survive in the world that “Hope” is the only thing that keeps you alive?

name: Fried Chicken in Wonderland
description: This is a story about a guy who loves his girlfriend and Parmesan cheese powder.

name: Summoner Apprentice
description: Delve into the mystical art of summoning alongside Feylin, the last of the Ancients. Begin your journey as her new apprentice and learn how to summon minions, outwit your enemies, collect relics to enhance your powers and overcome the dreadful obstacles set in your path.

name: Apollo Lunar Mission
description: Apollo Lunar Misson VR Simulator is a first-person experience on the surface of the Moon, as a member of the Apollo mission crew. Have fun while completing the tasks and exploring the Moon surface. Drive the Lunar Rover first hand.

name: Hope's Journey: A Therapeutic Experience
description: An RPG made by a team of medical doctors and therapists designed to help players cope with emotional difficulties.

name: Tap Those Targets
description: Tap Those Targets is a casual "shooting gallery" game. Targets appear on the screen and you must click on them as fast as possible. Targets spawn faster and get smaller over time; some even move around! How many can you click?

name: Wicked Rails VR
description: Wicked Rails is a mini VR game where you ride through dark and dangerous caves. Your most important mission is to survive the ride and escape the impending doom. Rack up your points by collecting all gems and destroying the lava flows. Make sure to avoid all the obstacles!

name: Heretic's Lot
description: What will you get out of mixing puzzle, RPG and roguelike? Correct - HERETIC’S LOT! Make your way through cursed lands to repent your sins. Learn perks, collect battle spells, solve puzzles, discover magic auras, fight bosses, find what cursed lands are hiding.

name: My Very Own Lair
description: True artificial intelligence is at hand, time to build your very own lair! Start from an old mansion in the UK and pick a place to move. But careful, the World will try to stop you. Will you make it to Mars?

name: MegaBattle
description: Build robots and enter the arena to battle! Robots have taken control of the galaxy and now humans must build bots to fight in the MegaBattle Arena. MegaBattle combines the best of the CCG with innovative mechanics such as unique mana mode, opponent reading attack and a fast card draw system.

name: Awakening the Light
description: This 2D top down RPG follows NoName #1892 as he fights his way through vast amounts of monsters, navigates dangerous dungeons, and searches for the most important thing in his life: answers, while blending the excitement of classic adventure games with the fun and impact of story driven RPGs.

name: Haunting At Cliffhouse
description: Untangle the story of the family that has occupied Cliffhouse for so many years. Search for clues, solve puzzles, talk to guests, get summoned to a chapel, discover a luscious Japanese garden and find your way through the rainforest. There is so much to discover about the family, the land and the lore.

name: Ninja Girl
description: A full-scale action game in which one Kunoichi fights against ninjas and necromancers during the Warring States period.

name: Ogopogo
description: A new concept in block-matching puzzle games. Compete for high scores and discover new gameplay twists as you journey into the depths of Okanagan Lake, searching for the legendary Ogopogo.

name: Tiger Girl Hill Breaker
description: Smash the girl's body with a small ball layer of camouflage, see her real side. Be careful not to let the ball fall off the screen, which will start over.

name: Impavidvm
description: Impavidvm is a physics based platformer with puzzle solving components where you have to overcome increasingly complex obstacles, testing your abilities and observation skills.

name: DawnWander
description: DawnWander is a cold and dark shooter about the survival of a nameless soldier in a rough winter. There is no room for weakness, fear, and doubt. You are a wild animal in the wild environment. You've to find the way out of this cold and empty hell.

name: FindDark
description: FindDark is a first person horror game. You have to find a clue to escape from inside the confined space and use that clue to move to the next place. How long it takes or how to find clues is up to you.Uncover all the mysteries that take place in this game and immerse yourself in storytelling.

name: Space Agent: 8 Artifacts
description: Journey through time and space to get for mankind 8 artifacts that hide powerful knowledge. A fascinating story, various levels, many weapons and enemies – the grandiose adventures await you in the game!

name: Stak Atak
description: Stak Atak is a cute tile-matching game where players are able to tailor their game to play how they want. With multiple difficulty sliders, a party mode, and local 2 player verus modes, Stak Atak is fun to play however you want!

name: Bright Days in Quarantine
description: In a world where you need to stay at home to curb a virus pandemic, get your act together by revisiting old hobbies and find joy in the small things in this intense shelter game. Otherwise, you go insane!

name: Odenavirus Online
description: In this building that refuses to closes due to the pandemic, you are free to create your character, interact with other players, set up your room and complete missions to unravel the truth. Just be careful, and protect yourself from the virus!

name: SpeedingRoad
description: Welcome to the world of straight highway speeding.

name: Tanky Panky
description: Fun, chaotic, cut-throat multiplayer vehicular mayhem. Let theft, carnage and cunning be your motto. Support your teammates, outwit and back-stab your enemies. Snatch flags, grab power-ups, but don't forget to protect your base.

name: Asterminer
description: Asterminer is a short, slow paced, relaxing, and atmospheric game about performing tiny pleasant tasks. As the sole operator in charge of your station you must manage and maintain the UEMC mining operation.

name: Cry of Athena
description: Create your own battles by summoning armies from a wide range of historical eras, fiction, and folklore - watch them fight, intervene with god powers or join in the battlefield yourself. Cry of Athena features a variety of AI, environment destruction, battle creation, and on the ground VR combat.

name: Jiang Yao Shen Bing
description: 《降妖神兵》是一款奇幻武侠生活模拟游戏，经营自己的根据地，在地牢中探索冒险，升级最强装备，击败邪恶妖王！

name: Zaccaria Pinball: 27 Retro Tables
description: This DLC unlocks 27 retro pinball tables!

name: Yare.io
description: Real-Time Strategy game where you control your units by writing JavaScript code.

name: VRC Pro: International Oval On-Road Tracks Deluxe
description: This VRC PRO International Oval On-road tracks Deluxe pack gives you 4 additional, real existing international high-speed oval on-road RC tracks. Expand your outdoor oval on-road tracks selection, experience real existing world class tracks , and join more events & more multiplayer sessions

name: Nullmaze
description: Welcome to the infinite world that you can change with the only superpower - you available to buy items from which this world will be generated!

name: Horroyale
description: Horroyale is a multiplayer horror game where only one player can remain alive. The playing field is silent and in total darkness: the only thing that occasionally illuminates the field is the moonlight. To make the hunt more enjoyable, terrain has been made to look lifelike and realistic.

name: Discover girl
description: Gently move the mouse, players can be in a hazy canvas, found one after another sexy exposure of the beautiful girl.

name: Rathe: The Beginning
description: Turn based, party focused, elemental world, short story RPG.

name: Tourney
description: Tourney the medieval tournament simulator. build the ultimate medieval tournament, and lead your house to glory!

name: Chess Destroyer
description: Do you love chess and want to play it with some new rules but the same moves? Then this game is for you!

name: End of Panduora
description: "End of Panduora" is a fast-paced fantasy-style strategy management game. In a randomly generated corner of the abyss, by consuming sanity in exchange for strength that does not belong to you. In the endless sea, create a new paradise to welcome the remnants of the old gods.

name: Bear Haven Nights 2
description: Welcome to the Bear Haven 2! This time we built our motel deep in the woods. Nothing will disturb your peace of mind away from civilization. At night we have some strange problems with alarm, but we're sure you'll manage to fix this.

name: One Spirit
description: In a world torn by a Cold War that never ended, a young man returns home to face the reality of a dying nation and its consequences for his loved ones. Live the despair of a lost generation in One Spirit, an alternate-history, coming-of-age visual novel with a breath-taking art style.

name: Kilemol
description: Kilemol is a top-down shooter where you'll have to destroy all spawn capsules and enemies using different weapons in a dynamic gameplay.

name: Memories of Tomorrow
description: A Slice-of-life Anime Visual Novel about 4 friends trying to recapture old feelings. Has multiple story branches and endings.

name: I made a ...
description: a puzzle about different camera perspectives at the same time

name: Kaikatana
description: On an epic journey you will try to avenge your brother's death, fighting with colossal creatures in the hope of saving your people from despair.

name: Train Mechanic Simulator VR
description: Take your opportunity as real Train Mechanic in VR. Find locomotives around game world that needs your help and repair them in one of 3 workshops localized in huge 25 km2 open world. You will be face all types of damages in all genres of trains: Diesel, Electric and even Old-School Steam units.

name: Ego Death
description: An action, puzzle platformer about Jack who attempts suicide and fails, and his inner demons that want him to see it through.

name: CodeWalkers
description: A fast-paced online action-battle game. Train your partner and customize their skills. Practice against the single-player AI, then battle against the world in seamless online PvP.

name: South Pass
description: Learn to use your controller like a musician, playing four unique instruments in this hybrid Rhythm/RPG set in a small mountain town on the day the internet goes out!

name: Veg Out Crew
description: A simple arcade game, old school, pixel art graphics and just a good fun game! Oh and it's also got different fruit and veg characters for you to choose from. Lots of weapons, enemies, traps, levels, you know how it is, get in and get gaming!

name: Arena Experiment
