description: Arena Experiment puts you in the role of a participant in a reality show, where your only task is to survive in a closed zones called Arenas for as long as you can.

name: Golf With Your Grandmother
description: Try to keep your grandmother alive through these 30 weaponized golf courses.

name: A Nasty Farm
description: An 3d arcade game depicting the unclear situation of chicks trapped by Dr. Mazi, a mad, self-proclaimed scientist who has targeted little defenseless chicks.

name: Robot Lord Rising
description: Welcome to a co-op arena battle game fueled by panic and humor! Fight daunting robot bosses on your couch or online with up to 4 players. Program your hero with action cards, and play nice with your friends! With 30 seconds on the clock each round, you need to be fast and tactical! Fastical!

name: Void's Blight
description: Void’s Blight is a Horror Atmospheric Platformer. The void has taken over the world leaving you as the only sole survivor of its onslaught. Can you survive long enough to rid the world of the Void’s Blight?

name: JPN Burst
description: JPN BURST lets you drill through the Japanese kana systems: Hiragana and Katakana. See, type, and repeat until the characters are built into your muscle memory so you can efficiently study the Japanese language.

name: Astral Cube
description: A 2.5D Platformer unforgiving game, avoid obstacles & survive.

name: Kony 2020
description: Joseph Kony is in deep peril! Will Jessica J. Kellen be able to save him and defeat an inter-dimensional demon that only she can defeat, or will she crumble under the weight of her newfound burden. What even IS Field Hockey? Find out in Kony 2020

name: Schrodinger's Catgirl
description: [IS THE GIRL IN THE MANOR ALIVE OR DEAD?] Investigate an abandoned manor, gather evidence, and make choices that affect both the past and future in this mystery point-and-click adventure.

name: The Search for Deep Loving
description: With 30 days to try and discover your soulmate, you have to work each day to get past the crazies. Unfortunately, online dating is not always the safest way to meet people and each date could be fatal. Will you meet your soulmate? Or will you crash and burn, literally, in your search?

name: Idol Keeper
description: Idol Keeper is a 3D one-player turn based game where you have to make many strategic choices as you face demon waves, with many random events guarantying hours and hours of unique gaming time.

name: Konsairi
description: Platformer and adventure gameFind a root vegetable, hold it up (KONPSI), eat it, throw it, etc., and move on!Adventure in a big world with PICO-8 specs and cute little dots!

name: Jack Walker: Ethereal
description: Jack Walker: Ethereal is a Sci-Fi/Action/RPG game for advanced VR players, with unique movement and combat mechanics. You play as an intergalactic bounty hunter who can fly and shoot laser beams out of his wrist as well as slow down the time. The fate of the universe is in your hands...

name: Stolen Hearts
description: Stolen Hearts is a puzzle platformer, where you must play as the four main characters to recollect all the hearts. Each character has a special ability and must use it to complete the very different challenges in their respective worlds.

name: Elemental Echoes
description: Enjoy sitting back at the classic feel of the turn-based RPG's you grew up and fell in love with. Follow the story of Tyra, a War-Axe Wielding Spellslinging Half-Elf and her friends to discover the dark past of magic and the mysterious history of her parents.

name: Beat Biome
description: Play music through your headset and Beat Biome will automatically pick it up, reacting to the beats and wavelengths. Enjoy several psychedelic environments, even create your own!

name: Strange Lands
description: Strange Lands is a fun, light, old-school platformer with a few modern twists. With a style and simplicity reminiscent of the classics, Strange Lands delivers an escape to worlds beyond our own. Join Sarah as she fights her way past untold dangers and numerous challenges.

name: ExSpire
description: ExSpire is a bullet hell dungeon crawler where time is a currency. Explore what makes you tick, manage your seconds, and climb The Spire to undercover its secrets.

name: Road to Nowhere
description: You are a policewoman, but with the occurrence of a murder you become a murderer! The victim is a master who loves you deeply! You're innocent! How should you deal with the sudden planting of false accusation? How do you escape? It all depends on your choice.

name: Venkazoid Blast
description: You are Vakimoh. They are the Venkazoids. Fight for your life in this quick and brutal arcade-style shooter. Can you escape your cage?

name: Sword and Stone
description: Gather your party for a procedurally generated open-world adventure in this Skyrim meets Minecraft multiplayer RPG. Gather resources, craft weapons, embark on epic quests, and erect a city to last for thousands of years. Have caution, though, these lands are cursed and desperate to destroy you.

name: Chronicles of Elmyra
description: The young wizardess Faira has been commissioned to investigate strange deadly nightmares. Start this new adventure exploring the world of Elmyra. Will she be able to complete her mission?

name: Voenkomat
description: VOENKOMAT is a social game. This game makes it possible to become a worst enemy of russian teens and guys - military comissar. You need to send to the army as many as possible soldiers, protect yours military HQ from foreign spies and save your soul from karmic devastation.

name: Heavy is the Hand that Holds the Six-Shooter
description: A mouse controlled isometric adventure in the Wild West with real time combat and some light survival and CRPG elements. Let him who is without sin cast the first stone. Heavy is the hand that holds the six-shooter.

name: Motherboard
description: Motherboard is an action-adventure game, settled inside the computer! Take on the role of the Bit - one of the inhabitants of the motherboard and help him to save the world from viruses!

name: Outer Space Shack
description: Build a space base on the Moon or Mars with current technology, from the 1970s to the space race starting now. Optimize every pound of payload of your rockets, exploit local resources and ensure the welfare of your courageous astronauts.

name: Powerboat VR
description: Powerboat VR is an advanced power boat simulator designed specifically for VR but also supports Non-VR modes. Take part in challenging races against AI opponents or simply relax and enjoy exploring the scenery!

name: Roll Control
description: Inspired by games like Super Monkey Ball and Marble Madness, Roll Control is a 3D balance based platformer, built to be played with your body. Using the Roll Controller App on your mobile device, players can transform their balance board into a human game controller.

name: Ultra Break
description: Ultra Break is a modern take on the classic brick-breaker genre which merges classic, fast-paced gameplay with new mechanics and tight controls.

name: Rig Score
description: Photorealistic graphics have arrived. Render the graphics of the future... today. Build your own cinematics, simulate car photography, benchmark your PC and compare it to others on the Leaderboard. Toggle ray tracing in real-time.

name: Minimalist Space War
description: A minimalist retro space shooter. Challenging, fast, and fun game play

name: Nex:Os Colosseum
description: NEX:OS is a community driven Ability/Movement focused Looter-Shooter style FPS game set in a war torn future. You play as a Centurion, a Biologically and Cybernetically enhanced near-immortal super soldier.

name: Ling Chong Xiu Xian
description: Sin descripción

name: Long Distance
description: Gather a friend, a family member or your SO and dive into this cooperative puzzle platformer!

name: I Wish Michael Phantomino Were Here
description: You are Michael Phantomino, a little ghost who shows up wherever someone needs help solving pentamino puzzles.

name: The Last Hope
description: The Last Hope is a Metroidvania-style platform game with RPG elements, in which the player controls an unnamed character who is transported against his will to the underworld, and now has to discover how to escape and how to survive the dangers around him.

name: Forester Simulator
description: Take care of a forest, chill out in nature, and protect it from people that just don’t care! Cut trees using big machines or chase wood thieves on quads. Be kind to animals, make friends with them, and see for yourself what the forest hides.

name: 混沌西游
description: Sin descripción

name: Wizard Bros
description: Have fun with up to Four of your Wizard Bros in this action packed Couch Co-Op Party Brawler with Ragdoll Physics.

name: HandsON
description: HandsON is a unique experience in virtual reality that you don't want to miss out on! Let this magical world of hands and dance amaze you and immerse yourself in an interactive surreal world you have never seen before.

name: Dramaqueen
description: DRAMAQUEEN lets players tell their own stories, and share them with their friends, for fun, for learning or for both.

name: Chaos Road
description: Chaos Road is an action-packed 3D shmup race shooter where you can drive different cars and rid the city of crime with an arsenal of weapons. Take the fast lane on traffic, attack and smash cars rivals on the road to revenge the city!

name: Gun Party
description: "Gun party" is a cooperative hard core double rocker Top Down shooting game. Where there are many zombies, play the survivor of zombie virus, fight side by side with other players, and take part in the intense self-defense counterattack to defeat the enemy

name: Seeking Revenge
description: Hardcore 3d Top Down Shooter inspired by Hotline miami. In the game you have to go through bright levels with nice graphics. Choosing different weapons, destroy enemies while listening to stylish music. At the end of the levels, see short hand-drawn inserts that move the plot.

name: Clockwork Pussy
description: A young mechanic girl ( and nymphomaniac former hooker ) inherits from her sexual client a huge vehicle repair shed. However, this workshop is in the middle of a neighborhood dominated by a gang of criminal freaks.

name: Herbis
description: Herbis - is an easy-to-learn game that requires concentration, speed, and reaction. Find patterns, collect combos, get points and go to new levels! But remember, your time allotted to complete each level is limited!

name: Rawshire the Last Hatchling
description: Play an action adventure collectathon where an evil dragon has destroyed the last dragon sanctuary of Rawshire. Level up, unlock new abilities (unlimited flight), take on gigantic mythical bosses, solve unique puzzles and uncover the truth about who you are. Every choice matters.

name: After Crisis: Snowstorm
description: A game with survival and decryption elements in a frozen world.

name: Huge Breast Princess Knight Anne
description: Huge breasts are nothing but a bother for a knight... this is an RPG about a huge breasted princess-knight who struggles for the sake of her country and her family.

name: Hibow
description: Hibow is a simulation of the future of multiplayer combat VR game. In the arena of the future world all players as a variety of superheroes compete and fight with players all around the world.

name: Butt Naked & Big Guns
description: Big Guns just got fired and had all her money stolen from her account. She now has to work for a slave driver of a boss, the psychopathic Butt Naked. She must kill monsters and pests or end up on skid row.

name: DeadOS
description: DeadOS is an early access zombie outbreak simulator by Benn Powell that focuses on city-wide scenarios where you have access to fully customize your apocalypse experience from beginning to end. Simulation. Sandbox. Survival!

name: Divided Kingdoms
description: Divided Kingdoms is a multilayered medieval real time and turn based strategy with elements of role playing in the mix. You will have to unite your once mighty Kingdom and restore its former glory by overcoming challenges using strategy and skill.

name: Dasher
description: A game about a mysterious robotic coliseum. Use your dashing abilities to dismantle your enemies, and survive until you find a way to escape this mechanical cemetery.

name: Akyrikon VR
description: Everyone familiar with RPGs know that to get better, your hero sometimes need to grind and train. But this time, it will be you. Train in VR to make your hero stronger and maybe you will be able to become a true defender of Akyrikon.

name: Platzkart Simulator
description: Travel in a soviet platzkart train through Syberia

name: Cosmoscope
description: Cosmoscope is a top down twin stick shooter with a twist. The game combines the frantic action of classic space shooters with unique kaleidoscope inspired gameplay. Tasked with defending Humanity against a mysterious alien race, you will need to use both firepower and your quick wits to survive.

name: Bride for the Princess
description: Bride for the Princess is Erotic Yuri Visual Novel that tells a story about a Princess who must find someone to marry before her upcoming coronation due to a conspiracy; a legislation that was passed behind her back in attempt to ruin her.

name: Grit Paintball
description: Grit Paintball is a Virtual Reality tournament paintball trainer and simulator. Aimed mostly at current paintball players looking to gain an edge in the real game, Grit allows players to practice from home.

name: Poetry, wine and sword
description: 挂机爬塔副本，懒人休闲游戏，诗词题材，词条策略搭配，重铸强化，体验慢慢变强的感觉，已更新门派，侠客，经脉，种植，厨师玩法，新装备玩法更简单休闲，可穿满8件相同装备。欢迎加群一起设计600733136

name: Somnium Shore
description: A challenging, 2D Platform Adventure game where all level mechanics can change if you don't stay balanced. Help Ethan to grow up and leave his roots in order to pursue his dreams, find clues about his past and fight against your nightmares in your journey to the Somnium Shore!

name: Pumpkin Farmer
description: The genre? 2D. The theme? Feel good. mechanics? You look for the pumpkin. Appeal? It should brighten up your day.

name: Kooring VR Coding Adventure
description: Let’s ride the Blockstar and go on a journey to the Coding World. Help Kooring catch the troubled Tooring in the beautiful Block World! Having fun playing block coding fosters logical thinking and creativity. The Highest Level of Immersion Brings The Highest Learning Effect!

name: Trappuzzler
description: trappuzzler is a puzzle game about feeling trapped and moving people.

name: Song of the Tides
description: Embark on a journey with no return to explore, fight and loot your way through the Shifting Isles- by yourself or with your friends. With the winds as your guide, you might just discover your destiny.

name: Mane
description: Wild lion Narrative sim RPG focused on choices and consequences portraying the violent lion social structure in its ruthless unbending laws of nature. Telling its timeless tale in an exaggerating visual and romanticized lore as a kingdom medieval glory.

name: Psychoverse City
description: PSYCHOVERSE CITY, a dizzyingly fast-paced first-person platformer across the rooftops of an ever-evolving cityscape, accompanied by adrenaline-pumping beats!

name: Basement Dweller
description: Basement Dweller is a satirical and comedic first person game powered by daily routines and activities. Can you handle it?

name: Helixian
description: Helixian is a top down space shooter akin to games like Galaga with intense boss fights and bullet hell like stages

name: Spacey Vade
description: Synth-wave styled physics based 2D puzzle shooter filled with nods to the golden era of classic arcade games. Think upside down Peggle crossed with Space Invaders and enemies crafted from the blended remains 70's, and 80’s gaming.

name: Thrust Legend
description: There are a lot of bad thrust clones out there... This is not one of them.

name: Physics World
description: "Physics World" is a fast-paced horizontal version of the decryption game. There are various colorful physical formulas in the scene, which represent some physical rules. Players can create favorable situations by changing the common physical rules.

name: Puzzle Bowling
description: Puzzle Bowling - is a minimalistic puzzle game.Just figures and a task to be solved. Nothing extra.

name: Karakia Shooter
description: Fast Paced, Bullet Hell Retro Shooter! Shoot down enemies and dodge everything. Fight through 17 intense levels with 6 insane boss fights. Do you have what it takes to beat the game?

name: Farm Dungeons
description: This game was placed 5th in the ranking of Paid RPG and 11th in the ranking of All Paid Game in the Japan App Store! Farm simulation dungeon RPG "Farm Dungeons" is finally here! It's full of fun elements such as agriculture, craft, cooking, guild, pets, dairy farming, and home remodeling!

name: Monster Legend
description: ”Legend Monster“ is a 3D game with roguelike, self-propelled chess and strategy. You can upgrade various fantasy creatures and form different team lineups. These creatures have their own unique skills.

name: Dawn of the Others
description: In this genre-bending zombie shooter, you will be faced with a challenging mission. To save the town of Ivannovsk. Fight off the zombies whilst completing quests, come across hidden objects, and explore the huge island of Neli Inew Lands, as a lone wolf, or with a team of survivors in multiplayer.

name: Eye of Ouroboros
description: Eye of Ouroboros is an action roguelike adventure game set in a mythical state between life and void. Master the heroes fighting styles and the unique perks acquired throughout the journey. The game can be played by 1-4 players.

name: Black Infinity
description: black infinity is a multi online FPS game. Take control of your favorite character and fight your way through the field until you're the last one standing!

name: Swire Future
description: "Swire Future" is a high degree of freedom game from the era of ancient mythology to the future era. Players can choose any character in this world to play. The Age of Archaic Mythology includes 10 professions, random characters account for 6 professions.

name: Knight of the Parking Lot
description: Knight of The Parking Lot is a vibrant and magical round based brawler. Fight your way through the wild creations of an overactive imagination, wielding weapons the world offers up to you.

name: Crazy Jump
description: "Crazy Jump" is a 2D jumping game. Players will play as spheres, go through various levels set by the Demon King, and finally save the world. In the game, the Demon King will challenge your reaction speed, control ability, and adaptability!

name: MachineryWorld
description: This game is a sci-fi action role-playing game From assembly to painting, you can greatly customize your character

name: HexaLife
description: Hexalife is a survival / roguelike game based around a procedural hexagonal world. Complete dungeons & set up camp!

name: Fallen Rebellion
description: Run and jump through the land of an ancient civilization in a challenging platformer in which your goal is to reach the end without any saves.

name: Domestic Defense
description: Home invasion horror game. Manually set up security cameras to try to locate and eliminate the threat from your household. Deal with distractions from others, and work to stop the intruder before it is too late. Not too serious. More of a fun, gameplay oriented experience.

name: Tale of MoWu
description: "Tale of MoWu" is an MMORPG. The game provides players with a lot of different quality equipment, which can be obtained by challenging various BOSSs. the pursuit of obtaining high-level (or superb) equipment has become one of the main goals of players in the game.

name: Left Dex
description: Left Dex A Game With Challenge, Adventure, Strategy, Indie, Parkour Rectangle, Large Difficulty, Single-Player Game, Sun and Realistic Shadow.

name: Disc Golf Valley VR
description: Disc Golf Valley is home to some of the most beautiful and challenging disc golf courses in the world. Now you can experience them in spectacular VR! Fill up your disc bag, sign up for tournaments and challenge every course in the Valley.

name: Mayhem Space Cinema
description: Board into the “Mayhempalooza III” the interstellar Earthling research Spaceship, gather your Friends, share youtube, facebook or twitch videos and let the mayhem begins!

name: Mountains and Rivers scroll
description: Shanhai Scroll is a 2D round card strategy game. Players will collect monsters in the plot and open a beautiful story about why monsters turn into monsters.

name: Canyon Shooter
description: A super classic aerial metal warhead mini game. As a special soldier in the game, you are ready to fight the enemy in the air. Let's act together!

name: Floral Town
description: Floral Town, the adorable Life Sim with a focus on interesting characters and relationships!

name: Restoration Master
description: Restoration Master - become the master of restoration and discover your unknown skills! Unscrew, saw, weld, grind, remove rust, paint, and earn money!

name: Beast Nature
description: You have to fight your fears and solve a mystery of this area. We dont know what lives here aliens, ghosts, bigfoot or just some wild coyotes, when night comes something weird used to happen. Better find something more powerfull then your old shotgun...

name: Astronomia
description: Astronomia is a spatial 3D puzzle game with a minimalist classic arcade art style. Guide the ball around each level to clear every fragment block and unlock the goal. A fun brain-teaser for casual and hardcore puzzlers alike!

name: Jewel of Kuru
description: Experience the enchanted land of Kuru, filled with secrets and incredible multilevel bosses to fight on your way to find the Jewel Of Kuru which lies in the secrets on this majestic open world. Set in fantasy land of Kuru, its focuses on amazing boss fights with hack n' Slash gameplay.

name: Velocity Vector
description: Velocity Vector grants you a chance to challange your VR gaming skills in a form of a fast paced action/platformer/racing game. You jump on platforms, you drift through the race track, you fly in tunnels!

name: Planet Hop
description: Planet Hop is a game for the Gameboy. It is a family-friendly, pick up and play retro style action platformer, reminiscent of past Nintendo Gameboy games series, such as Mario Land and Kirby.

name: Sam & MaRU
description: Program robots to solve issues around Singularity Corporation’s factory. Make sure to keep your head down and eyes focused on your work tasks that take the form of puzzles. Don’t worry, Singularity has everyone’s best interest at heart and would never be planning something sinister...

name: Insect: Bombardier beetle
description: Insect: Bombardier beetle - a game about beetle survival in the aggressive world of ants. Find and destroy all enemies yourself or use other insects and creatures to achieve the goal.

name: Everless
description: This Is a 2D top-down puzzle game which takes place in a fantasy world. Explore a top-down world, moving obstacles to progress through the game while using your brain to see if you can figure out what to do next!

name: Annie and the Shadow Palace
description: Annie's shadow has lost her body and is trapped in the shadow palace. Her shadow must balance light and dark to navigate the winding walls and endless tunnels to escape.

name: Boom! VR
description: Dance the night away on the Boom!VR festival. We prepared a unique VR festival site for you to go crazy on the dance floor or just hang out and enjoy the music.

name: Lighthouse of Madness
description: Embark on this Lovecraft-inspired tale and discover the mysteries that await you in this island. Explore the enigmatic lighthouse, solve challenging puzzles and most importantly: try not to lose your sanity when facing the darkness of your mind.

name: Snake Man's Adventure
description: Help Snake-Man save the Earth! ...And maybe even the whole galaxy in this unique platform adventure. Make new friends from all over the universe. Explore numerous environments to find hidden secrets, but watch out for enemies and obstacles - it's time to prove that a snake can be a hero too!

name: Broken Thorns: West Gate
description: A symbolic story where you play as a stranger who just came from cursed land, searching for peace in this wretched world. You will wander through the dying world, finding yourself in different situations where evil forces will try to stop you by using your fears, doubts, and weaknesses.

name: Bromeliad
description: In Bromeliad you are stranded on a pacific island where you are a Human-Bear. You will have to survive, gathering materials to build tools and bases. You will need to hunt for food, explore, tame animals, then, at night strange creatures will appear. Survive and find an element to return to normal.

name: Pentaquin: Deeds of Twilight
description: Pentaquin: Deeds Of Twilight is a hand-drawn 2D-Platformer Game, combining beautiful art and music with a deep, dark story all about re-uniting your broken family in a world shattered by war.

name: Zombie Dungeon
description: This is a game that looks very simple, enjoy frustration, time and time again.Drag the character to the end, use unique weapons to overcome various difficulties in the process, that's all of this game!

name: DreamScript
description: DreamScript is an educational first person puzzle game. Reprogram your environment, complete tasks and explore the dreamy world of DreamScript.

name: Journey to Moonray
description: Journey to Moonray is a hypnotic, top-down twin-stick shooter featuring silky smooth visual FX and intense combat. Journey to Moonray offers beautiful shaders built on fluid physics to create a unique and surreal visual experience combined with classic, top-down twinstick shmup action

name: Ninja Leagues: Masters of The Mystic Arts
description: Two teams of elite ninja face off in the arena to secure the legendary Power Scroll. They must smash through the opposing teams defenses to reach the scoring gate. That's all easier said than done when everyone uses their full arsenal of deadly Ninja Arts and weapons to come out ahead.

name: AHH!!! MazeZing
description: A first person maze game.

name: Cyber-Ante
description: You are being hacked by increasing amounts of hackers who use many different techniques to get in the system. All you need to do is use your abilities to hit all the switches that shut down the ports that the hackers are coming in on. But, watch out, there are many different ways they can successfully hack in.

name: Ripshot
description: Ripshot is a fast paced DieselPunk hover racer with grappling hooks! A new take on the classic hover racing genre. Swing around corners and use your Ripshot to gain a competitive edge.

name: Bad Meme
description: ENDLESS MEMES ROTATING LIKE CRAZY - How far can you get before you eat dirt!?

name: Lodestar
description: Lodestar sends you and your squad of friends on your own space odyssey. Transverse multiple planets in a journey to get home without losing yourself or your ship to the perils of the unknown! Gather resources, farm asteroids, and survive... with your own oh-so welcoming AI sidekick!

name: Frikin the Laser Shark
description: A 2D bullet hell platform shooter where you play as a normal shark...with a laser strapped to his head. Battle through worlds to defeat the dastardly denizens of the deep lead by the mean mustachio'd menace himself!

name: Buddy's Creative Quest!
description: Buddy's Creative Quest! is a short, cheat code based, atmospheric plat-former! Unlock over 50 cheat codes to alter the gameplay!

name: Lucifer: Paradise Lost
description: Finally the long awaited prequel to Jesus Christ RPG is out! Play as Lucifer, the devious dark angel, in this retro arcade styled four-directional shooter.

name: Escape Knox Manor
description: Escape rooms are fun! But Escape Knox Manor asks the question what if you were actually kidnapped? And what if you had to escape a mansion? Find out now!

name: Galia Senki: Yuuhen Annales
description: This is a strategy game taking place during the Gallic War.

name: The Only Wise
description: A non-linear detective, where you, based on the knowledge gained, make decisions and investigate the case. This is a short story with no markers or directions, only information. You, the player, decide what is right and what to do. What turns out to be true?

name: Mysterious: Dark Journey
description: Mysterious: Dark Journey - is an action platformer, where you explore mythical lands full of enigmatic creatures and dangerours passages, hidden behind the Gates. Transform to use different abilities in order to overcome challenges that are waiting for you.

name: Kingdomonium
description: The medieval procedurally generated side-scrolling real time strategy game. Build up and command your kingdom to explore and conquer the land. Forage, chop, dig, mine, build, fish, sail, explore and strategically battle your way to greatness!

name: Your planet in 60 seconds
description: Your planet in 60 seconds is a deck and world building game on different and beautiful planets all over the universe.

name: Mey Rescuer
description: It involves mechanics of eliminating enemies and solving puzzles with the weapon that also puts blocks, while going through floating islands in your adventure

name: Uploaded
description: Uploaded is a fast-paced, parkour, online multiplayer, and single-player shooter created by only one developer where you play as a robot with a human mind uploaded to it.

name: Into the Knight
description: Endless waves of enemies are attacking as you attempt to stay alive during your ill-fated quest. Show your honor by fending them off for as long as you can.

name: Candy Bear 2
description: In this family-friendly 2-d action game, you are a bear dodging green bunnies and collecting delicious candy. You're running over bricks, climbing up ladders, traversing bars, floating on moving platforms, and pushing crates to reach the next level. Includes over 240 levels for hours of fun.

name: Widgets and Gidgets
description: You are a lowly gnome, making parts, earning shinnies, building (and repairing) machines on a quest to earn 1 million shinnies.

name: Nobody's Quest
description: A cozy sandbox RPG adventure in a mini pixelated open world. Explore the realm of Hubbington, collect crafting materials and resources, save the citizens of Hubb Burg so they can help you in return, defeat Evil spawns and face your ultimate foe!

name: Fantasy Sprite Island
description: Fantasy Sprite Island is a collection of spirit capture training, home construction, copy adventure and other business development type of game.

name: Mecha Destruction
description: Mecha Destruction - Beta is a simple top down game where you destroy cities as a giant Mecha robot. A love letter to Mecha and Kaiju culture, the game will soon feature fights against enemy monsters and a campaign with multiplayer planned as well.

name: The Lost Game: Royal Game of Ur
description: The Royal Game of Ur is a board game thought to be played as early as 2600BC. The Lost Game seeks to restore this ancient tradition with a twist. The board is entirely customizable, allowing players to reshape the strategy of the game and even share it with others through the Steam Workshop.

name: Underfire
description: Underfire is a dynamic multiplayer team war game. You have to fight on stragic maps using various weapons up to 8 players. By correctly managing your current arsenal and skills, you must lead your team to victory!

name: Countdown Final Zone
description: Countdown Final Zone is a dynamic first person shooter. You have to battle on large post-apocalyptic maps using various weapons. Prepare yourself for epic fight on battle royal mode, deathmath, team deathmatch and zombie anihilation.

name: Dungeons and Kingdoms
description: Build your kingdom, grow your population, adventure into the wilds as a party of heroes, explore dungeons, trade, survive and prosper.

name: Flood Fill
description: Flood Fill is a fast paced action-arcade game. The concept is easy, the game is not. Avoid the enemies, and section off areas of the map. Section off enough of the map, advance to the next level.

name: Curse Lsland
description: Try to survive on a mysterious island full of zombies!

name: Franz Fury
description: Post-apocalyptic, top-down, arcade-action-murder-racing game. Drive the most brutal weapon-packed musclecar you can imagine!

name: No More Home
description: Tactical cooperation FPS, you are part of an elite commando force, came to free the city from the "Salvagers" claw. Terrible extra-terrestrial machines that are here to exploit the earth's resources. Are you gonna just run into the fight? Or play stealth and safe?

name: Pictoglyph
description: Pictoglyph is a Nonogram/Picross style puzzle game in which the player learns and remembers a set of shapes represented by symbols, which have to be marked on a grid using clues and logic.

name: Lazy gang
description: The main characters will have to reluctantly unite in a mercenary squad and go on an adventure to distant islands.

name: Phobyark
description: Phobyark is a new type of platformer / horror game that will immerse you in the twists and turns of phobias !

name: Disaster Drive
description: Disaster Drive is a retro-inspired arcade racing game where you only have 10 seconds to reach the next checkpoint, or it's GAME OVER. Skillfully drift around twisty corners using nitro boost while avoiding disaster to multiply your score to the top!

name: Tormans
description: Tormans is an open world, tactical RPG in a post-technology setting. You can do anything, go everywhere and become adventurer, rogue, to travel through the ruins of an ancient unknown world of about 1220 km. Do your best to write own history in this harsh realm and understand what happened here.

name: The Banana Saved the World
description: The Banana Saved The World is a classic platform game with levels to go as well as end-of-level bosses Avoid traps and enemies, to defend yourself you only have one stone to throw at them

name: Zonex
description: ZONEX is a 3D realtime dynamic effects showcase with both PC and VR support.

name: Heaock
description: Heaock is a casual puzzle game with a minimalist style similar to Sokoban, designed to free players from worries and feel a moment of tranquility.

name: Formula Team
description: Formula team management. The Formula Team will allow you to play the role of a team director, the success of the entire team will depend on you. If you are a huge Formula fan and have always been excited about the racing atmosphere? This game is made just for you.

name: Tinseltown Tycoon
description: Tinseltown Tycoon is a management and simulation game that puts you at the head of an obscure film production studio. With control over all aspects of studio operations and the movie production pipeline you can lead your studio to industry domination, financial ruin, or anything in between.

name: Too Much Water
description: Too Much Water is a top-down castaway simulator with an exquisite "splash" of humour, and a captivating story.

name: Regions of Ruin 2
description: Explore a rich and unique open world in this Adventure RPG. Uncover lost dwarven ruins, build a new society and re-establish dwarven kind.

name: Bullets
description: Hello, every one, I'm a developer. The game is made of Unreal Engines 4. In the game, the player will play the role of conqueror, eliminate the rebels and win.

name: Choco Chef
description: Create strands of delicious molten chocolate. Combine all sorts of pralines together and lead them to the collector.

name: Survival Draw
description: What if your life is rules by some cards ? That's what Survival Draw show to you !

name: Slime Sprint
description: Sprint through lava ridden dungeons and attempt to achieve the best time possible in this arcade style 2D platformer. With 30 levels to play and many slimes to unlock, can you achieve the medals needed to become the slime sprint king?

name: Best Friend
description: A 3rd-person exploration game explore a series of dreams and reconnect with your childhood best friend: your French Bulldog. Take control of both a human and French Bulldog as you experience a violently emotional story. Beware of the collectibles. They determine the fate of your friendship.

name: Dark Stone: The Lightseeker
description: A rogue-like deck-builder where you play as the Recruiter. Set up your team wisely and choose the order in which they will fight carefully. With an expanding army under your control and different paths leading to new encounters, each run will offer a unique experience.

name: Fish Feast
description: Fish Feast is an underwater side-scrolling eat 'em up game. You start playing as a tiny fish in the ocean with an insatiable appetite. The more you eat, the bigger you get!

name: Spycity
description: SPYCITY is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game about Spies and Agents. The spies must be quiet, hide in plain sight, and perform secret missions, while the Agents must find and eliminate the Spies.

name: The Great Pickle Adventure
description: In The Great Pickle Adventure, a pickle-based platformer, you can compete for the best level times, relax in an RPG world or try your skill in a game of breakout. Become a master of gravity and find your favorite among multiple unique weapons. Explore 20+ unique themed levels and special levels.

name: Ebola 2 Survival
description: EBOLA 2 survival - is created in the spirit of the great classics of survival horrors. In this game, you will control the main character with a first-person camera which makes you feel like you’re in a real horror movie.

name: PrisonShow
description: A short story of tyranism and little bit optimisim. A contest for her mostly freedom.

name: Jaeger
description: Jaeger is a third-person MOBA game with a massive character customization and unique combat system.

name: Hexacore
description: HEXACORE is an attention grabbing puzzle game that tests your swiping skills while fighting against time. Get to customize your world of Hexacore with multiple skins and keep your powers at the ready to compete with the world out there. ​​Take on the game and let's see if you survive.

name: Patter Warrior
description: This is a first person shooting game，The player plays a special soldier in a small town full of enemies，Players are free to explore the surrounding areas,Players can kill the enemy or avoid the enemy's attack, and try to keep their health value alive for a long time.

name: Criminal T
description: Step into the shoes of a newly formed police officer who receives a promotion opportunity for an investigator, but to get it you will have to solve a series of criminal cases.

name: Fire Boy
description: A hero who talks to the player in a comical way about his actions in the game, adventure in classic 2D platform style, are 5 worlds with different and challenging characteristics. Join the Fire Boy and help him recover all the dinosaur eggs that were stolen by the little monsters.
